about_the_game:
About the game

In "San Sacrament Cemetery", horror mixes with humor, creating a unique and immersive experience. 

The game relies on a fear that gradually grows, keeping players attentive to every detail to unravel the dark mysteries that surround the place.

Situated in a quiet country town, you move into a humble house you found on the internet. The detail they didn't mention? The house is next to a cemetery! At least the rent is cheap.

As you adapt to your new routine, explore every corner, interact with the environment and experience strange and unexpected events that will transform your everyday life into an intriguing supernatural adventure.

  • Have complete freedom to explore the world your way. Do you want to unravel hidden mysteries or just live your daily life? The choice is yours. Every day, the house changes, revealing new secrets and tasks that need to be completed.

  • Interact with common objects, eat something, watch TV, or just pass the time. But don't be fooled by the apparent normality. Over time, your dreams will become darker, sleep paralysis will become more frequent, and what was once familiar will take on a sinister tone.

  • Every decision you make will shape the course of your story, leading to different endings. Fear will grow subtly, mixed with an unsettling feeling that something is always lurking.

short_description: Take on the role of a protagonist plagued by insomnia, nightmares, and sleep paralysis as he tries to find comfort in his new home. Perform everyday and mundane activities alongside supernatural events combining an atmosphere of humor and horror.
